ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 12 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Nikon D5300 Digital SLR Camera Body (Red) + <2> Nikon 18-300mm VR DX AF-S Lens + <3> Nikon Digital SLR Camera Case +
<4> Spare EN-EL14 Battery + <5> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <6> Precision Design 58" Tripod +
<7> PD 77mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <8> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable + <9> Precision Design ML-L3 Remote +
<10> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <11> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <12> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D5300 Digital SLR Camera Body (Red) with 18-300mm VR Zoom Lens + 32GB Card + Case + Battery + Tripod + Remote Kit
